embeddedItem.name: Enhancement Paste: Fire
embeddedItem.desc: Upon use, increases Fire DMG of all allies by <nobr>24%</nobr> for the next battle.
embeddedItem.lore:
A cream made from a mixture of Path materials and other things.
Apply it to the right weapon to boost combat effectiveness.

"Half the effort, double the result."

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

155889.name: Phlogiston
155889.lore:
Particles that form the flame.
Genius Society #2 Harald Punch proved its existence, but #3 Nyul Iman disproved it.
#7 Bohdan overthrew Iman's conclusion and proved it again before getting killed by #4 Polka Kakamond days after announcing Phlogiston's existence.

"Does it exist or not? We're not interested, frankly speaking."
comeFrom: Backwater Pass: Flamespawns or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

155986.name: Feather of Flame
155986.lore:
Warm dark feather with a weak ember at its tip.
Sparks trail the feather as it's waved around.

"The legend of the Phoenix spreads far throughout the entire universe..."
comeFrom: Cloudford: Mara-Struck Soldiers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

273338.name: Recipe: Enhancement Paste: Fire
273338.desc: A simple equation. When entered into the Synthesizer, it will unlock a new recipe.

440482.name: Strange Matter of Destruction
440482.lore:
Strange matter that seems to possess the power of destruction.
Resembling fire but not quite, it is neither cold nor hot and will damage anything that comes into contact with it for over 12 seconds.
Could be the Antimatter Legion's version of trash.

"Creatures that received blessing from Nanook all have twisted appearances."
comeFrom: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
